title: Strategies for Enhancing Adult Learner Engagement in Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Usage Skills and Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Learners are general citizens aiming to strengthen social sector competencies through non-degree courses, with accessibility ensured via provided digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three types of activities that enhance engagement in online environments.
Learners can apply at least two engagement-inducing strategies when designing projects based on constructivist approaches.
Learners can evaluate and improve their own online learning engagement levels based on qualitative case study results.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
